data.name: Builder Simulator: Prologue
data.detailed_description:
FULL GAME

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1120320/Builder_Simulator/


About the Game




Welcome to Builder Simulator: Prologue!

This is the place where you'll get your first assignment Builder! Make sure to grab your toolset, safety equipment and let's head out to build our first building! Construction awaits!

Prologue version is a starter edition of the full version of the game.

Builder Simulator is the perfect game for those who want to build a house, from the ground up, one brick at a time. On easy, the game will guide you step by step and allow you to learn by showing you full instruction, but on hard you will get no help - instead rely on your builder skills and make everything yourself.

Builder Simulator will let you:

  • Create your own projects - build houses, shops and industrial buildings.



  • Use different tools - use specialist equipment as it's meant to be.



  • Take care of building materials - do not let the construction site run out of materials needed for work.



  • Create your own materials - Mix water and cement to create concrete, but make sure your proportions are right.



  • Do It Yourself - do everything yourself, don't worry about incompetent workers messing your work up.

[

data.short_description: Welcome to Builder Simulator: Prologue! This is the place where you'll get your first assignment Builder! Make sure to grab your toolset, safety equipment and let's head out to build our first building! Construction awaits!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 7/8/10
  • Processor: i5 4460 or AMD ryzen 1600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750TI 2GB
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: i5 9400f or ryzen 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB
